description.en:
The goal of the Influencer (IMI) project is to energize the domestic online celebrity market and create synergies through integration with overseas online celebrity markets. I'm Influencer is a platform that strives to meet the needs of professionals in their field and is designed to be more intuitive than Instagram.

Influencer (IMI) is a structure through which weblebrities and consumers can collaborate to create value on a virtual platform without real contact, and through which a blockchain-integrated fashion business model can be developed.
